mapper.select:
select IFNULL(sum(ci_order_num),0) as orderNum, IFNULL(sum(ci_driver_num),0) as driverNum from bi_saas_ci_device_day
where data_date = #{findDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select IFNULL(sum(ci_fact_end_num),0) as ciFactEndNum, IFNULL(sum(ci_driver_num),0) as ciDriverNum, IFNULL(sum(ci_fact_over_amount),0) as ciFactOverAmount, IFNULL(sum(ci_order_num),0) as ciOrderNum, IFNULL(sum(ci_bad_evaluate_all_num),0) as ciBadEvaluateAllNum, IFNULL(sum(ci_bad_evaluate_num),0) as ciBadEvaluateNum, IFNULL(sum(ci_order_cnt_notchannel),0) as ciOrderCntNotChannel from bi_saas_ci_device_day
data_date between #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
